channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Agony, Scourging, Crowning with Thorns, Carrying the Cross and Crucifixion help us to accept pain and perseverance to the very end. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Zambia, Dj Baza
channel.desc: The strength of radio in Africa is in its ability to reach the most remote villages in a continent where infrastructure is poor and electricity intermittent. In the town of Livingstone in Zambia, there is a leading Catholic station called Radio Musi-o-Tunya, run by a Catholic nun. The documentary follows the story of trainee journalist DJ Baza as he hones his skills covering stories ranging from rap artists to the impact of unregulated mining on the health of local people. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Speaking Of Saints
channel.desc: Susan Conroy explains Blessed Mother Teresa of Calcutta's humility. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Syria, ?it?s Not The End?
channel.desc: Fr. Hugo and his team developed a network to bring basic needs to the most vulnerable in war torn Syria. See the faith and courage in these Christian men and women enduring war. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Faith And Life
channel.desc: Fr. Joseph Mary of the Franciscan Friars talks about his previous work in a housing estate run by Irish gangs. Lessons he learned from his own teenage years helped him evangelize and improve the lives of others. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: After working on ecumenism initiatives as a Lutheran, Dr. Michael Root?s convictions led him to Catholicism in 2010 where he continues to be an important voice of Christian unity. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Jubilee Of Youth
channel.desc: From St. Peter's Square. (150 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints For Today
channel.desc: Father John Horgan explores the life of Blessed Dominic of the Blessed Sacrament and his special love for the sick and the priesthood. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother explains how the Church is our map while on this journey and pilgrimage of life. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: God's Blueprint For A Happy Life
channel.desc: What is the true meaning of the law in Scripture? As you'll see, the law of God is not just about duty. It?s intimately connected to inner peace of the soul and the perfection of human flourishing. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Biblical Story Of The Mass
channel.desc: Learn why God chose the docile, little lamb as the sacrificial paradigm of discipleship, with hosts Fr. Wade Menezes and Tom Nash. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Divine Child Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite the litany of the Divine Child Jesus from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch continues looking at the ?Deuteronomistic History? found in Isaiah, and examines how King Hezekiah found goodness in suffering because it led him to repent of his sins. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Acts Of God
channel.desc: When men seek to do their own wills instead of God?s will, the devil separates and divides. Host Frances Hogan discusses the unity of the Church as the work of the Holy Spirit. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: A Marvelous Gift
channel.desc: Accompany Thomas, a teen who found refuge in his room playing videogames, as he joins a group of young Catholics preparing for Confirmation, and unexpectedly grows in his Faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Danielle Bean discusses the many ways that the Catholic Church champions women. Hosted by Johnnette Williams, part 2 of 3. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholics, The Bible & The Early Church
channel.desc: Father Harold Cohen S.J. examines the nature and meaning of the papal office. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints Vs. Scoundrels
channel.desc: When both saint and scoundrel are confronted with their fates, Maximilian Kolbe still chooses to trust Christ?s Divine Will, and embrace his suffering and eventual martyrdom. Part 2 of 2. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chesterton Station
channel.desc: Two more detectives join the case. As the team ponders the death of Mr. Faith, the truth comes to light, and Dorothy finds the answers she needs to continue into the next world. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Donald Calloway talks about the Saints, and how their heroic deeds, miraculous lives, and miracles performed were bolstered by consistent daily practice of the virtues. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Get A Life In Christ
channel.desc: Fr. Benedict Groeschel, priest and psychologist, tells us how to have an encounter with Christ. The Church, in spite of the problems of recent years and in the resulting attacks in the media, is still the place to meet God. Fr. Groeschel reminds us that Christ promised that the Church will last "until the end of time.". (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Our Lord said in the Gospel, "I have come that you may have life and have it more abundantly." A stepping-off point for Father to explain radiant living from Christ's point of view. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Vatican
channel.desc: The Jubilee of Digital Creators and Jubilee for Young People from across Rome. Remembering Sister Clare Crockett, a young nun whose joyful faith continues to touch lives. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Coming To Christ: Young Adults And The Church
channel.desc: Susan Conroy discusses the opportunities suffering presents for us to grow in our relationship with Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Roamin? Catholic
channel.desc: As Rob prepares and attempts to leave for back to back trips, he and Pete realize the meaning of being a good host and a good houseguest, just as Mary was to her cousin Elizabeth. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: International Children?s Rosary
channel.desc: Members of the Children?s Rosary prayer movement lead the Glorious Mysteries in a unique Rosary experience embracing Jesus and our Heavenly Mother. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.desc: Mother Angelica and the Poor Clares of Perpetual Adoration recite the Glorious Mysteries of the Rosary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Savoring Our Faith
channel.desc: Msgr. Daniel Gallagher discusses with Fr. Leo the use of Latin in the Church as a bond among all Catholics. They prepare a favorite dish of Fr. Leo's when he was a seminarian in Rome. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Dynamic husband and wife radio team Jim and Joy Pinto bring their powerful witness to daytime TV with special guests and topics focusing on marriage, family, and pro-life issues. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: I Forgive, With Immacul?e Ilibagiza
channel.desc: Haunted by memories of multiple abortions, Patricia Sandoval overcame homelessness and drug abuse to find healing and purpose in life. Witness her miraculous journey that led her to forgive others and forgive herself. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother explains how the Church is our map while on this journey and pilgrimage of life. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Glorious Mysteries of the Resurrection, Ascension, Pentecost, Assumption and The Coronation of May help us to receive the graces of faith in the Eternal Life, desire for Heaven, docility to the Holy Spirit, a holy death and the Communion of Saints. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: An Ewtn Holy Land Experience
channel.desc: Delve into the mystery of Incarnation as Fr. Joseph and Fr. Mark journey to sites throughout Bethlehem for an unforgettable Christmas experience. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Church Through The Ages
channel.desc: Fr. Connor discusses the influence of the Roman Empire on the civilization of first century Europe and the Mediterranean Basin at the time of Christ and Early Church. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Fr. Mitch continues looking at the ?Deuteronomistic History? found in Isaiah, and examines how King Hezekiah found goodness in suffering because it led him to repent of his sins. (60 minutes).

channel.title: Coming To Christ: Young Adults And The Church
channel.desc: Susan Conroy and her guests delve into how to discern the path that God has planned for their souls. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: From The Heart, With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: In John 13, Jesus washes the feet of his disciples, showing how to lead by humbly serving and offering cleansing. Mother Angelica explains how He commands us to love one another as the way to do his will even unto death. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Jim and Joy have best selling author , Anthony DeStefano, on the show to speak about his newest book, The Miracle Book ? A Simple Guide to Asking For the Impossible. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Doctors Of The Church
channel.desc: Part 1 of EWTN?s continuing series looks at influential theologian and philosopher, St. Augustine of Hippo. The story of his conversion, baptism and extraordinary life epitomizes the transforming power of grace. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Sr. Dierdre Byrne, of the Little Workers of the Sacred Hearts of Jesus and Mary, inspects how we can discern God?s Will for our lives and thus influence the culture for His glory. (60 minutes).

channel.title: Bob And Penny Lord Present
channel.desc: Bob and Penny Lord look at the life of St. Louis de Montfort, a French priest known for promoting devotion to the Blessed Virgin Mary in his writings and preaching. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Every week a different host brings on a panel of 3 experts to tackle topics on the minds of Catholics. From theology to social media, from young parents to the universal church, surround yourself with solid answers as you enter the Catholic Sphere! (30 minutes).

channel.desc: Chris Lowney talks about his new book recounting the life of St. Ignatius of Loyola, and the Ignatian experiences of conversion, healing and freedom that can serve as a guide for those who follow his pilgrim route. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reflections With Fr. Leo Clifford
channel.desc: Father Leo Clifford says that many do not allow the Word of God to penetrate their minds because they put off dealing with God and religion until they are old and "have time." We should listen now, absorb it, live it and be ready for a happy death. (10 minutes).

channel.desc: Today?s lesson is what it means to be contrite, and the role humility plays in the forgiveness of sin. A good examination of conscience is key to a good confession, and a necessary part of our life and growth in Jesus. (15 minutes).

channel.title: Lukas Storyteller
channel.desc: The fair reaches the reef and everyone must earn their ticket. When Peter gets in trouble, his friends learn an important lesson about always telling the truth, as they follow the example of Saint Anthony of Padua. (15 minutes).

channel.title: Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about older Catechisms of the Catholic Church, forgetting sins when in confession, and why Protestants say Augustine and Aquinas were Calvinists. (60 minutes).

channel.title: Into The Breach
channel.desc: Believers are engaged in a spiritual battle. Today?s episode looks at the spiritual weapons men can use in the fight against Satan, and explains how they are called to be witnesses of their faith. (30 minutes).

channel.desc: The Shreveport Festival String Quartet performs Kermit Poling's original music reflecting on the lives of seven saints. Filmed in the St. John Berchmans Cathedral in Shreveport, Louisiana, and narrated by Fr. Peter Mangum. (60 minutes).

channel.desc: Explore the Lourdes Archives and see the actual rock on which the feet of the Mother of God stood, letters by St. Bernadette written in her own hand, and other fascinating Lourdes treasures rarely seen by the public. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: Jim and Joy continue their conversation with author Anthony DeStefano to share more about his newest book, ?The Miracle Book ? A Simple Guide to Asking for the Impossible.?. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reasons To Believe
channel.desc: Renowned Biblical scholar, Dr. Scott Hahn and co-host Mike Aquilina explain why even the problem of evil cannot swallow up the fact that God exists. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Finding God In All Things: The Teaching Of Ignatius Loyola On Daily Prayer
channel.desc: Fr. Timothy M. Gallagher, OMV discusses the second step of the Examen, Petition when one asks God for insight and strength that will make the examen a work of grace. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News In Depth
channel.desc: EWTN?s weekly one-hour discussion of current events in the Church, politics, and culture, from a Catholic perspective. Covering the underreported stories and clarifying the Church's position on key teachings, with a focus on the laity's needs and concerns. Hosted by Catherine Hadro. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: A Marvelous Gift
channel.desc: Accompany Thomas, a teen who found refuge in his room playing videogames, as he joins a group of young Catholics preparing for Confirmation, and unexpectedly grows in his Faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Joyful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (19 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Blessed Virgin Mary
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Blessed Virgin Mary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (11 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fr. Stanley Rother American Martyr
channel.desc: After struggling with his studies in the seminary, a young priest from Oklahoma discerns his call to serve Guatemala?s native people, no matter the cost. Hosted by Fr. Charles Connor. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Acts Of God
channel.desc: Host Francis Hogan explains that when God became man, Christ is calling all, Jew and Gentile alike, to holiness and salvation and home to His Holy Church. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Father Spitzer and Doug Keck discuss Father?s book, ?Christ, Science, and Reason: What We Can Know about Jesus, Mary, and Miracles.? They discuss how the apparitions and cures where at first a source of controversy in the Church and the town. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Fr. Andrew Hofer and Fr. Philip Nolan return to offer insights about the treasures of the Our Father as they share their beautiful book, ?Our Father, Our Prayer of Hope.?. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Mark Riedemann interviews his Excellency Bishop Emmanuel Kanon Rozario, the bishop of the Barishal diocese in Bangladesh where Catholics make up a tiny minority of the inhabitants. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Stones And Pearls: The Rosary In The Holy Land
channel.desc: In place of a crown fit for a king, Jesus is given a crown of thorns. Instead of a throne, He is thrust upon a judgment stone. Jesus is judged guilty of crimes deserving his death. This is the third sorrowful mystery. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints and Heroes
channel.desc: Find out why the Blessed Mother appeared to three peasant children in F?tima, Portugal. The adventure unfolds as the police, the bishop, and the townspeople gradually come to believe the children's remarkable story. Animated. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The First Saturdays For Kids
channel.desc: Sister Lucia teaches four children the importance of the First Saturday devotion, and the four steps necessary for fulfilling her request in this animated special. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Marian Procession From The Holy Land
channel.desc: A monthly Rosary Procession from the site of the Annunciation and Incarnation in Nazareth. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Cure Of Ars
channel.desc: In this EWTN original film, experience the extraordinary life, priestly ministry, and spirituality of Saint John Vianney, also known as the Cur? of Ars. Filmed in Ars, France. (100 minutes).
